verbs.description: [ARG0: cowboys] [V: considering] [ARG1: trade for amari cooper oakland raiders] head coach jon gruden may have insisted publicly that he does not intend to trade amari cooper but that has n’t stopped other teams from inquiring about the star wide receiver espn adam schefter reports that the dallas cowboys have been gathering as much information as they can about cooper and are interested in trading for him they are not the only team as the raiders have also heard from the washington redskins and washington redskins adam schefter raiders espn dallas adelaide raiders jon gruden trade indianapolis colts dallas cowboys amari cooper oakland raiders
